MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW2 postcode area of Crewe affecting properties in Derrington Avenue, Maxwell Street, Hammond Street and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 00:34am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:45am on 13th February 2021
